languages.text: "Дайте нам шанс, а? Нам бы дождаться, когда тут все утихнет, а там мы и сами в камеры вернемся, будем тихонько досиживать все, что нам причитается..."

traits.locale_text: "Дайте нам шанс, а? Нам бы дождаться, когда тут все утихнет, а там мы и сами в камеры вернемся, будем тихонько досиживать все, что нам причитается..."

languages.text: "Give us a chance, eh? We just want to wait until everything blows over and we can go back to our cells and quietly do the rest of our time..."
languages.original_text: "Дайте нам шанс, а? Нам бы дождаться, когда тут все утихнет, а там мы и сами в камеры вернемся, будем тихонько досиживать все, что нам причитается..."

traits.locale_text: "Give us a chance, eh? We just want to wait until everything blows over and we can go back to our cells and quietly do the rest of our time..."
"Give us a chance, eh? We just want to wait until everything blows over and we can go back to our cells and quietly do the rest of our time..."
"Give us a chance, eh? We just want to wait until everything blows over and we can go back to our cells and quietly do the rest of our time..."
"Give us a chance, eh? We just want to wait until everything blows over and we can go back to our cells and quietly do the rest of our time..."
"Give us a chance, eh? We just want to wait until everything blows over and we can go back to our cells and quietly do the rest of our time..."
"Give us a chance, eh? We just want to wait until everything blows over and we can go back to our cells and quietly do the rest of our time..."

languages.text: «Denos una oportunidad, se lo ruego. Solo queremos esperar hasta que todo se calme y podamos regresar a nuestras celdas para pasar tranquilamente el resto de nuestro tiempo...».
languages.original_text: "Give us a chance, eh? We just want to wait until everything blows over and we can go back to our cells and quietly do the rest of our time..."

traits.locale_text: «Denos una oportunidad, se lo ruego. Solo queremos esperar hasta que todo se calme y podamos regresar a nuestras celdas para pasar tranquilamente el resto de nuestro tiempo...».

languages.text: "Gebt uns eine Chance, ja? Wir wollen einfach nur warten, bis Gras über alles gewachsen ist und wir wieder in unsere Zellen gehen und den Rest unserer Zeit friedlich absitzen können ..."
languages.original_text: "Give us a chance, eh? We just want to wait until everything blows over and we can go back to our cells and quietly do the rest of our time..."

traits.locale_text: "Gebt uns eine Chance, ja? Wir wollen einfach nur warten, bis Gras über alles gewachsen ist und wir wieder in unsere Zellen gehen und den Rest unserer Zeit friedlich absitzen können ..."

languages.text: « Allez, quoi ! Laissez-nous une chance ! On veut juste attendre que ça se tasse pour pouvoir retourner tranquillement en cellule et terminer notre peine... »
languages.original_text: "Give us a chance, eh? We just want to wait until everything blows over and we can go back to our cells and quietly do the rest of our time..."

traits.locale_text: « Allez, quoi ! Laissez-nous une chance ! On veut juste attendre que ça se tasse pour pouvoir retourner tranquillement en cellule et terminer notre peine... »

languages.text: “不如饶我们一命吧？我们只想等风头过了之后，再回到我们的牢房里，继续打发日子……”
languages.original_text: "Give us a chance, eh? We just want to wait until everything blows over and we can go back to our cells and quietly do the rest of our time..."

traits.locale_text: “不如饶我们一命吧？我们只想等风头过了之后，再回到我们的牢房里，继续打发日子……”

languages.text: 「チャンスをくれよ、なあ？俺たちはただ、すべてが丸く収まって、独房に戻って残りの刑期を静かに過ごせるまで待ちたいだけなんだよ…」
languages.original_text: "Give us a chance, eh? We just want to wait until everything blows over and we can go back to our cells and quietly do the rest of our time..."

traits.locale_text: 「俺達にチャンスをくれないか、なあ？全て丸く収まるのを待って、独房に戻って静かに残りの時間を過ごしたいだけなんだよ…」
「チャンスをくれよ、なあ？俺たちはただ、すべてが丸く収まって、独房に戻って残りの刑期を静かに過ごせるまで待ちたいだけなんだよ…」

languages.text: "Bize bir şans verseniz? Ortalık durulana kadar beklemek istiyoruz. Sonra da hücrelerimize dönüp sessiz sakin cezamızı dolduracağız."
languages.original_text: "Give us a chance, eh? We just want to wait until everything blows over and we can go back to our cells and quietly do the rest of our time..."

traits.locale_text: "Bize bir şans verseniz, he? Ortalık durulana kadar beklemek istiyoruz. Sonra da hücrelerimize dönüp sessiz sakin cezamızı dolduracağız."
